verses.esv:
4   Delight yourself in the LORD,
    and he will give you the desires of your heart.
verses.kjv: 4 Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.niv: 4 Delight yourself in the LORD and he will give you the desires of your heart.

verses.esv: 24 Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall havethem.
verses.niv: 24 Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask for in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.

verses.esv: 18 Then the LORD God said, “It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him a helper fit for him.”
verses.kjv: 18 And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.
verses.niv: 18 The LORD God said, "It is not good for the man to be alone. I will make a helper suitable for him."

verses.esv: 7 “Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
verses.kjv: 7 Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:
verses.niv: 7 "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.

verses.esv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope. 12 Then you will call upon me and come and pray to me, and I will hear you. 13 You will seek me and find me, when you seek me with all your heart.
verses.kjv: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end. 12 Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you. 13 And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
verses.niv: 11 For I know the plans I have for you," declares the LORD, "plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future. 12 Then you will call upon me and come and pray to me, and I will listen to you. 13 You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

verses.esv:
22   He who finds a wife finds a good thing
    and obtains favor from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 22 Whoso findeth a wife findeth a good thing, and obtaineth favour of the LORD.
verses.niv: 22 He who finds a wife finds what is good and receives favor from the LORD.

verses.esv: 33 But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
verses.kjv: 33 But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
verses.niv: 33 But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

verses.esv:
16   Seek and read from the book of the LORD:
    Not one of these shall be missing;
    none shall be without her mate.
  For the mouth of the LORD has commanded,
    and his Spirit has gathered them.
verses.kjv: 16 Seek ye out of the book of the LORD, and read: no one of these shall fail, none shall want her mate: for my mouth it hath commanded, and his spirit it hath gathered them.
verses.niv: 16 Look in the scroll of the LORD and read: None of these will be missing, not one will lack her mate. For it is his mouth that has given the order, and his Spirit will gather them together.

verses.esv: 9 Two are better than one, because they have a good reward for their toil.
verses.kjv: 9 Two are better than one; because they have a good reward for their labour.
verses.niv: 9 Two are better than one, because they have a good return for their work:

verses.esv: 24 Therefore a man shall leave his father and his mother and hold fast to his wife, and they shall become one flesh.
verses.kjv: 24 Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother, and shall cleave unto his wife: and they shall be one flesh.
verses.niv: 24 For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and they will become one flesh.

verses.esv: 11:1 Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
verses.kjv: 1 Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
verses.niv: 1 Now faith is being sure of what we hope for and certain of what we do not see.

verses.esv: 4 Let marriage be held in honor among all, and let the marriage bed be undefiled, for God will judge the sexually immoral and adulterous.
verses.kjv: 4 Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.
verses.niv: 4 Marriage should be honored by all, and the marriage bed kept pure, for God will judge the adulterer and all the sexually immoral.

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding;

verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.

verses.esv: 2 But because of the temptation to sexual immorality, each man should have his own wife and each woman her own husband.
verses.kjv: 2 Nevertheless, to avoid fornication, let every man have his own wife, and let every woman have her own husband.
verses.niv: 2 But since there is so much immorality, each man should have his own wife, and each woman her own husband.

verses.esv:
31   but they who wait for the LORD shall renew their strength;
    they shall mount up with wings like eagles;
  they shall run and not be weary;
    they shall walk and not faint.
verses.kjv: 31 But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
verses.niv: 31 but those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.

verses.esv: 16 But I say, walk by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the flesh.
verses.kjv: 16 This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
verses.niv: 16 So I say, live by the Spirit, and you will not gratify the desires of the sinful nature.

verses.esv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of lights, with whom there is no variation or shadow due to change.
verses.kjv: 17 Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
verses.niv: 17 Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights, who does not change like shifting shadows.

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv: 9 Two are better than one, because they have a good reward for their toil. 10 For if they fall, one will lift up his fellow. But woe to him who is alone when he falls and has not another to lift him up! 11 Again, if two lie together, they keep warm, but how can one keep warm alone? 12 And though a man might prevail against one who is alone, two will withstand him—a threefold cord is not quickly broken.
verses.kjv: 9 Two are better than one; because they have a good reward for their labour. 10 For if they fall, the one will lift up his fellow: but woe to him that is alone when he falleth; for he hath not another to help him up. 11 Again, if two lie together, then they have heat: but how can one be warm alone? 12 And if one prevail against him, two shall withstand him; and a threefold cord is not quickly broken.
verses.niv: 9 Two are better than one, because they have a good return for their work: 10 If one falls down, his friend can help him up. But pity the man who falls and has no one to help him up! 11 Also, if two lie down together, they will keep warm. But how can one keep warm alone? 12 Though one may be overpowered, two can defend themselves. A cord of three strands is not quickly broken.

verses.esv:
3   Your wife will be like a fruitful vine
    within your house;
  your children will be like olive shoots
    around your table.
verses.kjv: 3 Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
verses.niv: 3 Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house; your sons will be like olive shoots around your table.

verses.esv:
23   The steps of a man are established by the LORD,
    when he delights in his way;
verses.kjv: 23 The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
verses.niv: 23 If the LORD delights in a man's way, he makes his steps firm;

verses.esv:
10    An excellent wife who can find?
    She is far more precious than jewels.
11   The heart of her husband trusts in her,
    and he will have no lack of gain.
12   She does him good, and not harm,
    all the days of her life.
verses.kjv: 10 Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies. 11 The heart of her husband doth safely trust in her, so that he shall have no need of spoil. 12 She will do him good and not evil all the days of her life.
verses.niv: 10 A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies. 11 Her husband has full confidence in her and lacks nothing of value. 12 She brings him good, not harm, all the days of her life.

verses.esv: 18 Flee from sexual immorality. Every other sin a person commits is outside the body, but the sexually immoral person sins against his own body.
verses.kjv: 18 Flee fornication. Every sin that a man doeth is without the body; but he that committeth fornication sinneth against his own body.
verses.niv: 18 Flee from sexual immorality. All other sins a man commits are outside his body, but he who sins sexually sins against his own body.
